com.lpoo.game.view.entities

Class PowerUpView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.view.entities.EntityView
      • com.lpoo.game.view.entities.PowerUpView

  • class PowerUpView
extends EntityView
    A class used to represent the Power Up's entity view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerUpView

        PowerUpView(Armadillo game,
            EntityModel.ModelType type)
        Creates a PowerUpModel's View. It calls its superclass constructor. EntityView(Armadillo game, EntityModel.ModelType type).
        Parameters:
        game - the game this view belongs to. Needed to access the asset manager to get textures.
        type - The type of PowerUP being created.

                                                                                                             java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates the animation used for this PowerUp Type.

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draws the sprite from this view using a sprite batch. Chooses the correct texture or animation to be used depending on the accelerating flag.
        Overrides:
